title: Tim Kane didn't "gun violence" attack Ohio's knife?
subtitle: Tim Kane's initial tweet about the Ohio State University attack was based on false early news reports that the aggressor used a weapon; he made a corrective tweet after seeing recent stories.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Mr. Tim Kane responded to the news of a machete attack at Ohio State University by tweeting that he was very sad about the foolish act of "gun violence."
